components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays To Multiple Networks in Brazil

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Claro network in Brazil. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Beeline Network In Armenia

incident_updates.body: We continue to investigate the issue causing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to the Beeline network in Armenia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with SMS delivery delays when sending messages to the Beeline network In Armenia. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Call quality issues to a Subset of Twilio UK Phone Numbers

scheduled_maintenances.name: Indonesia SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in Indonesia is conducting a planned maintenance from 17 May 2023 at 10:00 PDT until 17 May 2023 at 10:10 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from XL Axiata Indonesia handsets.

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner is conducting an emergency maintenance from 17 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 17 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from multiple networks in Asia, Europe and Middle East.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Beeline

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 10 May 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 17 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

10 May 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 10 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
11 May 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 11 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
15 May 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 15 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
17 May 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 17 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
